title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
OB: When switching perspectives, the CVS repository view loses its maximized state.
EB: The CVS repository view should remain maximized after switching perspectives.
SR:
1. Open the application and maximize the CVS repository view.
2. Switch to a different perspective.
3. Verify that the CVS repository view is still maximized.
